name: Bonfire
long_description:
Bonfire is the leading next-generation eSourcing / competitive bidding and RFx platform.  

Bonfire goes beyond the basic automation of eProcurement suites and older simple bidding tools, helping you to make better, faster decisions.  It’s a collaborative, powerful, and insightful cloud-based platform for today’s procurement needs.

We're focused on government procurement teams (which control ~18% of GDP) and enabling them to thrive in a world of crushing compliance requirements and very high workloads.

Bonfire streamlines the entire RFx and bidding process, helping to run projects >50% faster.  Bonfire empowers users with unparalleled evaluation features for deeper analysis, delivered through our distinctly intuitive and easy-to-use platform.

Bonfire is trusted with over a billion dollars of supplier selection decisions per month, and is one of the fastest growing new procurement technologies.
one_liner: Bonfire is reimagining RFPs & bidding for gov procurement teams
